# PdfPixels

> Free online image and PDF processing tools. Compress, resize, convert images and manage PDFs — no registration required.

## About

PdfPixels is a free web-based platform offering 55+ professional tools for image and PDF processing. All tools work directly in the browser with no signup, no watermarks, and no hidden fees. Files are automatically deleted within 1 hour of processing.

## Core Tools

### Image Tools
- **Compress Image**: Reduce image file size (JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC) while maintaining quality. Target specific sizes like 20KB, 50KB, 100KB.
- **Resize Image**: Change image dimensions in pixels, centimeters, or inches with DPI control.
- **PNG to JPEG**: Convert PNG images to JPEG format instantly.
- **JPEG to PNG**: Convert JPEG images to PNG format with transparency support.
- **WebP to JPG**: Convert WebP images to widely-compatible JPG format.
- **HEIC to JPG**: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG format.
- **Background Remover** (AI): Automatically detect and remove image backgrounds using AI.
- **AI Image Enhancer** (AI): Improve image quality, lighting, and colors with AI.
- **AI Upscale Image** (AI): Increase resolution up to 4x with AI, no quality loss.
- **Crop Image**: Crop images to custom, square, or circle shapes.
- **Circle Crop**: Crop images into perfect circles with transparent background.
- **Square Crop**: Crop images to 1:1 square ratio.
- **Freehand Crop**: Draw custom shapes for precision cropping.
- **Rotate Image**: Rotate images by any angle.
- **Flip Image**: Mirror images horizontally or vertically.
- **Add Watermark**: Add text or logo watermarks to images.
- **Add Text to Image**: Overlay text with font, size, and color options.
- **Add Logo to Image**: Overlay logos with position and opacity control.
- **Join Images**: Combine multiple images side by side or stacked.
- **Split Image**: Split images into grids (perfect for Instagram).
- **Image Color Picker**: Extract HEX, RGB & HSL color codes from images.
- **Blur Image**: Apply Gaussian blur effects.
- **Blur Background** (AI): AI-powered background blur, keep subject sharp.
- **Blur Face** (AI): Auto-detect and blur faces for privacy.
- **Pixelate Image**: Add mosaic/pixelation effects.
- **Grayscale Image**: Convert to grayscale tones.
- **Black & White**: High-contrast black and white conversion.
- **Sepia Filter**: Warm vintage sepia tone effect.
- **Invert Colors**: Create negative images.
- **Motion Blur**: Directional motion blur for action shots.
- **Censor Photo**: Blur, pixelate, or black-bar sensitive areas.
- **Pixel Art Converter**: Transform photos into retro pixel art.
- **Beautify Image** (AI): AI portrait enhancement — smooth skin, brighten eyes.
- **Retouch Photo** (AI): AI removes blemishes and imperfections.
- **DPI Converter**: Convert image DPI for print or web use.
- **Increase Image Size**: Increase file size to meet upload requirements.
- **Passport Photo Maker**: Resize photos to official passport/visa dimensions.
- **Image to Text (OCR)**: Extract text from images, 100+ languages.
- **Signature Maker**: Draw, type, or upload signatures.
- **Resize Signature**: Resize to exact dimensions for documents.
- **Merge Photo & Signature**: Combine photo and signature in one image.
- **View Metadata**: Read EXIF, IPTC, and XMP data from images.
- **Edit Metadata**: Modify image metadata fields.
- **Remove Metadata**: Strip all metadata for privacy.

### PDF Tools
- **Compress PDF**: Reduce PDF file size with adjustable compression.
- **Merge PDF**: Combine multiple PDF files into one document.
- **Split PDF**: Extract specific pages or split into individual files.
- **PDF to JPG**: Convert PDF pages to high-quality images.
- **Image to PDF**: Convert images to PDF documents.
- **Rotate PDF**: Rotate PDF pages by 90°, 180°, or 270°.
- **PDF Watermark**: Add text or image watermarks to PDF pages.
- **Protect PDF**: Add password protection to PDF files.
- **Unlock PDF**: Remove password protection from PDFs.
- **Reorder PDF Pages**: Drag and drop to rearrange pages.
- **Delete PDF Pages**: Remove unwanted pages from PDFs.

## Technical Details
- **URL**: https://www.pdfpixels.com
- **Pricing**: 100% Free
- **Registration**: Not required
- **File Security**: 256-bit SSL encryption, GDPR compliant, auto-delete within 1 hour
- **Supported Input Formats**: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, GIF, BMP, TIFF, PDF
- **Supported Output Formats**: JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF
- **API Documentation**: https://www.pdfpixels.com/api-docs
